carousel_items: Makes you sleepy. Take at bedtime.
Takes 8 to 12 weeks to see full effects on mood.
Stop taking slowly to avoid withdrawal symptoms.
Tell your doctor if you notice sudden mood changes or unusual thoughts.

basics.benefits_moa: Mirtazapine is an atypical antidepressant. It stimulates your body to make certain chemicals in the brain, such as serotonin and norepinephrine, which regulate mood.
basics.bottom_line: Mirtazapine is okay for treating depression and good for sleep. More likely to cause weight gain than any other antidepressant.
downsides: Not as effective as other medications for depression.
More likely to cause minor weight gain (1 to 5 pounds) and raise cholesterol than any other antidepressant.
Like most antidepressants, can cause higher risk of suicidal thoughts and behavior for people age 24 and younger.
The first antidepressant you try doesn't always work or it can cause side effects you really don't like. You might need to try a few different medications until you find one that works for you.

downsides_processed.orig: Not as effective as other medications for depression.
More likely to cause minor weight gain (1 to 5 pounds) and raise cholesterol than any other antidepressant.
Like most antidepressants, can cause higher risk of suicidal thoughts and behavior for people age 24 and younger.
The first antidepressant you try doesn't always work or it can cause side effects you really don't like. You might need to try a few different medications until you find one that works for you.

upsides: Effective at relieving some depression symptoms.
Starts to work more quickly than most antidepressants.
Might be a good option for people who have insomnia with their depression, because it can make you very sleepy.
Good option for people who are underweight or frail, because it can help you gain weight.
Six out of ten people who use an antidepressant for the first time find that it works for them.

upsides_processed.orig: Effective at relieving some depression symptoms.

Tons of weight gain and increased appetite. Makes my lows super low and harder to get out of.

I makes you sleep all the day, and it's good if you have insomnia

Strong antihistamine effects = take a few days off work when you start, because you will sleep nonstop. Not sure if there were sexual side effects, because I was just tired anyway. Don't think it had much effect.
My doctor prescribed mirtazapine after I developed allergic reactions to two other meds. It was an easy transition and generally works well for me with almost no side effects.
Time of dose is important.  If taking it for GI, then take it before meals.  Taking it at bedtime, kept me up for 3 hours.  No kidding!

userStories.satisfaction: Not worth it, thinking about stopping
userStories.tip: I over slept when taking this medication

I take it about an hour before bed as it usually makes me sleepy. Staying awake for too long after taking it can cause dizziness/nausea. Sometimes causes vivid nightmares and excessive perspiration (possible non-remembers nightmares)
It works moderately well for sleep maintenance but at doses above 7.5mg i find it hard to stay awake let alone focused, the next day.

I was prescribed this for insomnia/depression, but I had to take it early (~2 hours) before I actually wanted to fall asleep in order to feel like it worked, but I still have problems falling asleep and staying asleep.

userStories.identifier: Animal lover with mental health problems
userStories.tip: It makes a person feel incredibly tired, especially at first, so take it at night and go to bed a couple of hours earlier than normal. It seems to work by sedating and calming, which can be helpful or a hindrance depending on your needs.
I use this to treat insomnia. Gained 18lbs initially despite all the running. It takes a lot of work just to get down 5lbs and I"m active every day - intense on some.

carousel_items_processed.orig: Makes you sleepy. Take at bedtime.
Takes 8 to 12 weeks to see full effects on mood.
Stop taking slowly to avoid withdrawal symptoms.
Tell your doctor if you notice sudden mood changes or unusual thoughts.

risks_warnings.title: Suicidal thoughts or behavior
risks_warnings.description: Mirtazapine may increase the risk of suicidal thoughts or behavior. Watch for worsening depression or any unusual changes in mood or behavior, especially during the first few months of treatment or when the dose changes. Report anything concerning to a doctor immediately. Mirtazapine is not approved for use in children younger than age 18.

description_processed.orig: Mirtazapine may increase the risk of suicidal thoughts or behavior. Watch for worsening depression or any unusual changes in mood or behavior, especially during the first few months of treatment or when the dose changes. Report anything concerning to a doctor immediately. Mirtazapine is not approved for use in children younger than age 18.

risks_warnings.title: Serotonin syndrome
risks_warnings.description: Serotonin syndrome is a rare but potentially life-threatening condition caused when there's too much serotonin active in the brain. Your risk goes up if you use Mirtazapine with other medications that affect serotonin (other antidepressants, lithium, triptans, St. John's wort). Symptoms include fast heart rate, sweating, muscle stiffness or spasms, fever, and confusion. Get medical attention right away if you have symptoms.
risk_factors: Using other medications that affect serotonin

description_processed.orig: Serotonin syndrome is a rare but potentially life-threatening condition caused when there's too much serotonin active in the brain. Your risk goes up if you use Mirtazapine with other medications that affect serotonin (other antidepressants, lithium, triptans, St. John's wort). Symptoms include fast heart rate, sweating, muscle stiffness or spasms, fever, and confusion. Get medical attention right away if you have symptoms.

risks_warnings.title: Heart problems
risks_warnings.description: Mirtazapine can increase your risk of irregular heartbeat. If you have any risk factors, the maximum dose for you may be lower. Heart and blood tests may be required before starting treatment.

description_processed.orig: Mirtazapine can increase your risk of irregular heartbeat. If you have any risk factors, the maximum dose for you may be lower. Heart and blood tests may be required before starting treatment.

risks_warnings.title: Driving impairment
risks_warnings.description: Mirtazapine impairs your ability to focus, think, and react. Be careful. Avoid activities that require you to be alert, such as driving a car or operating machinery, until you know how this medication affects you.
risk_factors: Taking other medicines that make you less alert

description_processed.orig: Mirtazapine impairs your ability to focus, think, and react. Be careful. Avoid activities that require you to be alert, such as driving a car or operating machinery, until you know how this medication affects you.

risks_warnings.title: Weight gain
risks_warnings.description: Mirtazapine can increase appetite and cause you to gain weight.

description_processed.orig: Mirtazapine can increase appetite and cause you to gain weight.

risks_warnings.title: Blood disorders
risks_warnings.description: Rarely, Mirtazapine can lower white blood cell counts. White blood cells help your body fight infections. Tell your doctor if you have any infection symptoms (such as fever, sore throat, or mouth/throat swelling) that don't go away.

description_processed.orig: Rarely, Mirtazapine can lower white blood cell counts. White blood cells help your body fight infections. Tell your doctor if you have any infection symptoms (such as fever, sore throat, or mouth/throat swelling) that don't go away.

carousel_items: Wellbutrin makes you energized, so take it in the morning to avoid difficulty sleeping later that night.
Takes about 8 to 12 weeks to see the medication's full effects on your mood.
There are no sexual side effects from this medication.
Stop taking it slowly to avoid getting withdrawal symptoms.
Tell your doctor if you notice sudden mood changes or unusual thoughts.
The extended-release tablet shell can show up unchanged in your stool, but don't worry since the medication was still absorbed by your body.

basics.benefits_moa: Wellbutrin is an atypical antidepressant. Researchers don't know exactly how it works, but it seems to change dopamine and norepinephrine activity in the brain, which regulate mood.
basics.bottom_line: Wellbutrin is good for treating depression and has fewer sexual side effects than other antidepressants, but you need to be okay with avoiding alcohol.
downsides: Wellbutrin can be stimulating, so it can cause anxiety or insomnia the first few days you're taking it.
Generally not as good as other antidepressants for people who have anxiety.
It's less likely to cause weight gain than other antidepressants.
Has a higher risk of causing seizures, especially if you have a seizure disorder, eating disorder, or if you drink alcohol. So, it's not a good medication if you drink a lot.
It contains the same ingredient as a medication that helps you to stop smoking, (Zyban), so these two meds can't be used together.
Like most antidepressants, it can cause a higher risk of suicidal thoughts and behavior for people younger than 24.
The first antidepressant you try doesn't always work or it can cause side effects you really don't like. You might need to try a few different medications until you find one that works for you.

downsides_processed.orig: Wellbutrin can be stimulating, so it can cause anxiety or insomnia the first few days you're taking it.
Generally not as good as other antidepressants for people who have anxiety.
It's less likely to cause weight gain than other antidepressants.
Has a higher risk of causing seizures, especially if you have a seizure disorder, eating disorder, or if you drink alcohol. So, it's not a good medication if you drink a lot.
It contains the same ingredient as a medication that helps you to stop smoking, (Zyban), so these two meds can't be used together.
Like most antidepressants, it can cause a higher risk of suicidal thoughts and behavior for people younger than 24.
The first antidepressant you try doesn't always work or it can cause side effects you really don't like. You might need to try a few different medications until you find one that works for you.

upsides: Causes fewer sexual side effects than other antidepressants. Can actually boost sex drive for some people.
Can be taken with other antidepressants to counteract their sexual side effects.
Has some stimulant effects, so it can be energizing.
Also used to suppress appetite and help you quit smoking.
Six out of ten people who use an antidepressant for the first time find that it works for them.

carousel_items_processed.orig: Wellbutrin makes you energized, so take it in the morning to avoid difficulty sleeping later that night.
Takes about 8 to 12 weeks to see the medication's full effects on your mood.
There are no sexual side effects from this medication.
Stop taking it slowly to avoid getting withdrawal symptoms.
Tell your doctor if you notice sudden mood changes or unusual thoughts.
The extended-release tablet shell can show up unchanged in your stool, but don't worry since the medication was still absorbed by your body.

risks_warnings.title: Suicidal thoughts or behavior
risks_warnings.description: Wellbutrin may increase the risk of suicidal thoughts or behavior. Watch for worsening depression or any unusual changes in mood or behavior, especially during the first few months of treatment or when the dose changes. Report anything concerning to a doctor immediately. Wellbutrin is not approved for use in children younger than age 18.

description_processed.orig: Wellbutrin may increase the risk of suicidal thoughts or behavior. Watch for worsening depression or any unusual changes in mood or behavior, especially during the first few months of treatment or when the dose changes. Report anything concerning to a doctor immediately. Wellbutrin is not approved for use in children younger than age 18.

risks_warnings.title: Psychiatric effects for smoking cessation
risks_warnings.description: Wellbutrin is not approved for smoking cessation, but bupropion under the name Zyban is approved for this use. Some people taking it for smoking cessation have reported serious psychiatric effects, such as depression and, rarely, suicidal thoughts or behavior. These effects may be worse if you're withdrawing from nicotine because depression can be symptom of nicotine withdrawal. Watch for any sudden changes in mood, thinking, or behavior, and report anything concerning to a doctor immediately.

description_processed.orig: Wellbutrin is not approved for smoking cessation, but bupropion under the name Zyban is approved for this use. Some people taking it for smoking cessation have reported serious psychiatric effects, such as depression and, rarely, suicidal thoughts or behavior. These effects may be worse if you're withdrawing from nicotine because depression can be symptom of nicotine withdrawal. Watch for any sudden changes in mood, thinking, or behavior, and report anything concerning to a doctor immediately.

risks_warnings.title: Seizures
risks_warnings.description: Wellbutrin can lower the brain's threshold for seizures in people with certain risk factors. Use with caution.

description_processed.orig: Wellbutrin can lower the brain's threshold for seizures in people with certain risk factors. Use with caution.

risks_warnings.title: Mania
risks_warnings.description: Sometimes, depression is the first symptom of bipolar disorder. Treating someone with bipolar disorder with an antidepressant alone can cause a manic episode (great excitement, euphoria, delusions, and overactivity). Make sure your doctor has screened you for a personal or family history of bipolar disorder or symptoms, and a family history of suicide.

description_processed.orig: Sometimes, depression is the first symptom of bipolar disorder. Treating someone with bipolar disorder with an antidepressant alone can cause a manic episode (great excitement, euphoria, delusions, and overactivity). Make sure your doctor has screened you for a personal or family history of bipolar disorder or symptoms, and a family history of suicide.

risks_warnings.title: Increased side effects
risks_warnings.description: Wellbutrin is processed by the kidney and liver. If you have kidney or liver problems, you may need a different dose to prevent increased risk for side effects.

description_processed.orig: Wellbutrin is processed by the kidney and liver. If you have kidney or liver problems, you may need a different dose to prevent increased risk for side effects.

risks_warnings.title: Weight loss
risks_warnings.description: Wellbutrin may cause weight loss. Talk to your doctor if weight loss is not desirable.

description_processed.orig: Wellbutrin may cause weight loss. Talk to your doctor if weight loss is not desirable.

carousel_items: It's best to take Viagra about 1 hour before sexual activity, but you can take it anywhere between 4 hours and 30 minutes before you need it.
Don't take it more than once a day.
If you have an erection for more than 4 hours, go to the ER or call your doctor.
Can cause flushing, a headache, or dizziness.
Works best when taken on an empty stomach. Fatty foods can prevent Viagra from working as well.

clock.tip: Works slower when taken with food.

basics.benefits_moa: Viagra is a PDE-5 inhibitor. Blocking PDE-5 allows blood to enter the penis and helps create an erection.
basics.bottom_line: Viagra is a first-choice treatment for erectile dysfunction. It's the only one that's available as a generic, so it's cheaper than the alternatives. However, you need to take it at least 30 minutes prior to sex, so the lack of spontaneity may not be good for some people.
downsides: You need to take it at least 30 minutes prior to sex.
Can't be taken if you've had a heart attack in the past 3 months, or stroke or heart failure in the past 6 months.
Side effects can be more pronounced if you're over 65 years.
Can cause flushing, headache, and dizziness, or sudden hearing and vision changes.
Can't use if you've recently taken nitrates like Isordil, Imdur, or nitroglycerin (Nitro-BID, Nitro-Dur, Nitrostat).
Taking it after eating a high-fat meal can delay or reduce the medication's benefits.

downsides_processed.orig: You need to take it at least 30 minutes prior to sex.
Can't be taken if you've had a heart attack in the past 3 months, or stroke or heart failure in the past 6 months.
Side effects can be more pronounced if you're over 65 years.
Can cause flushing, headache, and dizziness, or sudden hearing and vision changes.
Can't use if you've recently taken nitrates like Isordil, Imdur, or nitroglycerin (Nitro-BID, Nitro-Dur, Nitrostat).
Taking it after eating a high-fat meal can delay or reduce the medication's benefits.

upsides: First-choice medication for treating erectile dysfunction.
Available as a generic, so it's cheaper than other medications in its class.
It can be taken only when you need it.

Available as a generic, so it's cheaper than other medications in its class.

carousel_items_processed.orig: It's best to take Viagra about 1 hour before sexual activity, but you can take it anywhere between 4 hours and 30 minutes before you need it.
Don't take it more than once a day.
If you have an erection for more than 4 hours, go to the ER or call your doctor.
Can cause flushing, a headache, or dizziness.
Works best when taken on an empty stomach. Fatty foods can prevent Viagra from working as well.

risks_warnings.title: Heart attack or stroke
risks_warnings.description: Taking Viagra for erectile dysfunction can put you at increased risk for heart attack or stroke if you've had problems with your heart in the past, especially in the past 6 months. Talk to your doctor if you are interested in taking this medication.
risk_factors: Having a heart attack, stroke, or rhythm problem in your heart in the last 6 months
Having low or high blood pressure
Heart failure or coronary artery disease causing unstable angina (chest pain)

description_processed.orig: Taking Viagra for erectile dysfunction can put you at increased risk for heart attack or stroke if you've had problems with your heart in the past, especially in the past 6 months. Talk to your doctor if you are interested in taking this medication.

risks_warnings.title: Prolonged erection
risks_warnings.description: There have been reports of men having an erection lasting more than 4 hours while on Viagra. This has been rare. If not treated in time, this can cause permanent damage to your penis, including impotence. Talk to your doctor immediately or go to the emergency room if this happens.

description_processed.orig: There have been reports of men having an erection lasting more than 4 hours while on Viagra. This has been rare. If not treated in time, this can cause permanent damage to your penis, including impotence. Talk to your doctor immediately or go to the emergency room if this happens.

risks_warnings.title: Vision changes
risks_warnings.description: There have been reports of men having permanent damage to their vision while on Viagra. This has been rare. Go to the emergency room or call your doctor immediately if you suddenly notice changes in your vision in one or both eyes.

description_processed.orig: There have been reports of men having permanent damage to their vision while on Viagra. This has been rare. Go to the emergency room or call your doctor immediately if you suddenly notice changes in your vision in one or both eyes.

risks_warnings.title: Hearing loss
risks_warnings.description: There have been reports of men having permanent hearing loss while on Viagra. This has been rare. Go to the emergency room or call your doctor immediately if you notice changes in your hearing in one or both ears.

description_processed.orig: There have been reports of men having permanent hearing loss while on Viagra. This has been rare. Go to the emergency room or call your doctor immediately if you notice changes in your hearing in one or both ears.

risks_warnings.title: Low blood pressure
risks_warnings.description: If you're taking alpha blockers or medications for high blood pressure and you're taking Viagra, your blood pressure may become too low. Be very careful getting up from a sitting or lying down position since this can make you feel dizzy and more likely to fall. Talk to your doctor if your medications need to be changed.
